help-file.title: CHANTS
help-file.content:
Chanting is a talent developed by monks used to further enhance their martial arts skills. There are a number of different chants available to monks, all varying in power and purpose.
Heroism -Heroism elevates the amount of adrenaline produced by the chanter and stimulates the centers of the mind controlling dexterity and balance, resulting in increased combat abilities. For the follower of the 'Way of the Snake' this rush of adrenaline also increases speed and movement while the Dragon Disciples become immune to fear.
Calm -Calm soothes whoever or whatever might be angry at the chanter or his friends. This chant has the capability of ceasing combat in certain situations.
Quivering Palm -This chant causes the chanter's hand to vibrate so fast it can barely be seen. The hand then strikes out at equally fast speeds, inflicting formidable damage upon its target.
Cell Adjustment -The chant allows the monk to rearrange the cellular makeup of his body to his own liking. This comes in handy when afflicted with various maladies.
Regenerate -When chanting Regenerate, the monk heals at a much faster rate.
Buddha Palm -Buddha Palm, much like Quivering Palm, causes the monk's hands to vibrate at unbelievable speeds. However, the Buddha Palm strikes out with both hands at lightning speed at as many adversaries as it can.
